story_02_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmm... I wonder what the deal is with those
weird, masked Trainers.
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ve heard some rumors! Apparently, a bunch of
Trainers wearing masks have been running
around trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Seriously?! It seems like I run into jerks like that
everywhere I go... Next time I’m not gonna
let them off so easily.
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’ve been waiting for you guys FOREVER!
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You’re those Team Break guys, aren’t you?!
Play dumb, and you’ll pay a fine!
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Team Break? What’s that?
Oh! Is that you, Barry?
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Wait, hold on—THIS is the guy we were 
looking for?! Why is he yelling at us?
story_02_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Here we go, Piplup!
Let’s show them what we’re made of!
story_02_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Eeek! It doesn’t look like we’re getting
through to him at all!
story_02_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! 
It looks like we’re gonna have to battle him!
